import React from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; const AboutPage: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About Sunrise Scents

Locally crafted fragrances made with passion in the heart of Vermont

üèîÔ∏è Made in Vermont
{/* Our Story Section */}

Our Story

Founded in the scenic mountains of Vermont, Sunrise Scents was born from a passion for creating beautiful, accessible fragrances that capture the essence of luxury without the luxury price tag.

Every morning as the sun rises over the Green Mountains, we're inspired to create scents that evoke emotion, memories, and dreams. Our small team of artisans carefully crafts each fragrance, drawing inspiration from the world's most beloved luxury perfumes while adding our own unique Vermont touch.

We believe that everyone deserves to smell amazing, which is why we've made it our mission to offer premium-quality fragrances at affordable prices. Each bottle represents our commitment to quality, creativity, and the natural beauty that surrounds us here in Quechee, Vermont.

Premium Ingredients

We source only the finest fragrance oils and materials to ensure each scent is long-lasting and beautiful.

Handcrafted with Love

Each fragrance is carefully blended by hand in small batches to ensure quality and attention to detail.

Affordable Luxury

We believe great fragrances shouldn't break the bank. Quality scents at prices everyone can enjoy.

{/* Vermont Section */}

Made in Vermont

Nestled in the beautiful town of Quechee, Vermont, our workshop is surrounded by rolling hills, pristine forests, and the inspiration that only New England can provide. The changing seasons, from vibrant autumn leaves to fresh spring blooms, influence our creative process and inspire new fragrance ideas.

Vermont's commitment to craftsmanship and quality aligns perfectly with our values. We're proud to be part of a state known for its artisanal products and dedication to excellence.

Our Location

Sunrise Scents, LLC.
PO Box 241
Quechee, Vermont 05059

{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Quality First

We never compromise on the quality of our ingredients or the craftsmanship of our products.

Accessibility

Beautiful fragrances should be available to everyone, not just those who can afford luxury prices.

Creativity

We draw inspiration from the world's best fragrances while adding our own unique creative touch.

Community

We're proud to be part of the Vermont community and support local craftsmanship and values.

); }; export default AboutPage;
